channel.title: Tooele County|Utah|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Tooele County|Utah|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: UT-58 West/BL-80 West at Frontage Road
item.description: UT-58 West/BL-80 West at Frontage Road. Continue west on UT-58/BL-80 for Wendover.

item.title: UT-58/BL-80 West - Wendover
item.description: UT-58/(BL-80 West) in Wendover

item.title: End UT-196 North at I-80 West (Exit 77)
item.description: End UT-196 North at I-80 West (Exit 77). End UT-196 shield in the background.

item.title: End UT-196 North at I-80
item.description: End UT-196 North at I-80 west to Wendover.

item.title: End UT-196 North at I-80
item.description: End UT-196 North at I-80 in Tooele County. Use I-80 east for Salt Lake City; I-80 west for Wendover.

item.title: UT-196 North Approaching I-80
item.description: UT-196 North Approaching I-80 (Exit 77) in Tooele County.

item.title: UT-196 North - Tooele County
item.description: UT-196 north in Tooele County.

item.title: End UT-199 West at UT-196 North
item.description: End UT-199 West at UT-196 North at entrance to Dugway Proving Ground.

item.title: UT-199 West at Government Creek Road
item.description: UT-199 West at Government Creek Road to Simpson Springs. Continue straight for Dugway; turn right to UT-196 and Timpie.

item.title: UT-199 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on UT-199 west. Distance to Rush Valley and Dugway.

item.title: UT-36 North at UT-199 West
item.description: UT-36 North at UT-199 West in Tooele County.

item.title: UT-36 North Approaching UT-199
item.description: UT-36 North approaching UT-199 west to Rush Valley and Dugway. Continue north on UT-36 to Tooele.

item.title: UT-36 North - Tooele County
item.description: UT-36 north in Tooele County.

item.title: UT-36 North at Benmore Road
item.description: UT-36 North at Benmore Road south to Benmore and Vernon Reservoir

item.title: UT-36 North - Tooele County
item.description: Entering Tooele County on UT-36 north. Tooele County is the second largest county in Utah by area.

item.title: I-80 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-80 East. Distance to Great Salt Lake and Salt Lake City.

item.title: I-80 East - Tooele County
item.description: I-80 east in Tooele County.

item.title: I-80 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-80 east. Distance to Knolls, Tooele, and Salt Lake City.

item.title: I-80 East - Tooele County
item.description: I-80 east in Tooele County, just east of the Bonneville Speedway interchange.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 41
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 41 - Knolls. The next exit westbound on I-80 is 37 miles. This is the eastern edge of the salt flats along I-80.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 49
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 49 - Clive.

item.title: I-80 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-80 west. Distance to Knolls, Wendover, and Reno (NV).

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 56
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 56 - Aragonite.

item.title: County Road at I-80 East (Exit 62)
item.description: County Road at I-80 East (Exit 62) to Salt Lake City.

item.title: Overpass at I-80 (Exit 62)
item.description: Overpass at I-80 (Exit 62) - Turn left for Military Area/Lakeside.

item.title: County Road at I-80 (Exit 62)
item.description: County Road at I-80 (Exit 62) in Tooele County.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 62
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 62 - Military Area/Lakeside.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 77
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 77 - UT-196 South/Rowley/Dugway. The shield is incorrectly labeled as UT-186.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 77
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 77 - UT-196/Rowley/Dugway.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 84
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 84 - UT-138/Grantsville.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 88
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 88 - Grantsville.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 99
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 99 - UT-36 South/Tooele.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 99
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 99 - UT-36/Grantsville/Tooele.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 1
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 1 - Wendover. This is the last Utah exit on I-80 westbound.

item.title: I-80 West Exit 410 (Nevada Exit)
item.description: I-80 before the Utah-Nevada stateline at Exit 410 - US-93 Alt/West Wendover/Ely. Exit 410 is a Nevada Interchange

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 1
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 1 - Wendover.

item.title: I-80 West Exit 2
item.description: I-80 East approaching Exit 2- BL-80/UT-58/Wendover.

item.title: I-80 West - Freeway Entrance
item.description: I-80 West (Exit 4) Freeway Entrance.

item.title: Bonneville Speedway Road at I-80 West
item.description: Bonneville Speedway Road at I-80 West in Wendover.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 102
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 102 - UT-201/2100 South.

item.title: End UT-36 North at I-80
item.description: End UT-36 north at Hardy Road and I-80 freeway entrance. Use left lane for I-80 west to Wendover; right lane for I-80 east to Salt Lake.

item.title: UT-38 North at UT-112 West
item.description: UT-38 North at UT-112 West to Grantsville. Continue north on UT-36 to Salt Lake.

item.title: End UT-112 East at UT-36
item.description: End UT-112 east at UT-36 in Tooele.

item.title: UT-138 East at UT-112
item.description: UT-138 east at UT-112 in Grantsville.

item.title: UT-138 East at UT-112
item.description: UT-138 east at UT-112 east to Deseret Peak Complex, Utah Fire Museum, and Tooele Army Depot.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 84 Offramp at UT-138
item.description: I-80 East Exit 84 Offramp at UT-138. Turn left on UT-138 to Grantsville and Tooele. Right for Solar Road.

item.title: I-80 East Onramp at Exit 4 Interchange
item.description: I-80 East onramp at Exit 4 interchange. Turn left for Salt Lake; continue straight for Frontage Road. The next exit eastbound is 37 miles at the other end of the Salt Flats.

item.title: I-80 West Traffic Use Exit 4
item.description: End BL-80/UT-58 east at I-80. The Exit 2 ramp only has eastbound interstate access. To use I-80 westbound, take Exit 4.

item.title: BL-80/UT-58 East at I-80
item.description: BL-80/UT-58 East at I-80 east onramp. This is the eastern end of the Wendover business loop.

item.title: BL-80/UT-58 East at Frontage Road
item.description: BL-80/UT-58 East at Frontage Road. Continue on BL-80/UT-58 for I-80 east to Bonneville Speedway and Salt Lake.

item.title: BL-80/UT-58 East Approaching I-80
item.description: BL-80/UT-58 East approaching I-80 in Wendover. For I-80 westbound, go east on I-80 to Exit 4.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 99
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 99 - UT-36/Tooele.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 88
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 88 - Grantsville.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 84
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 84 - UT-138/Grantsville/Tooele.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 77
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 77 - UT-196/Rowley/Dugway.

item.title: I-80 at Delle Interchange
item.description: Approaching I-80 onramps in Delle. Both I-80 shields are part of a white box, which is unusual in Utah.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 70
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 70 - Delle. Delle is the last fuel westbound to Wendover, in 68 miles.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 62
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 62 - Military Area/Lakeside.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 56
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 56 - Aragonite.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 49
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 49 - Clive.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 41
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 41 - Knolls. Knolls is at the eastern end of the Salt Flats. The next exit westbound is in 37 miles.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 4
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 4 - Bonneville Speedway. The white areas in the picture is salt - this is the western edge of the Salt Flats. The next exit eastbound is in 37 miles. The next Gas eastbound is in 66 miles at Delle.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 4 Services
item.description: Services at Exit 4. This is the last Gas for 66 miles until the Delle exit.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 2
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 2 - UT-58/Wendover. This is the eastern end of the Wendover/West Wendover business loop.

item.title: I-80 East - Welcome To Utah
item.description: Welcome to Utah on I-80 east. Each region in Utah has its own type of welcome sign. The welcome sign for the northwestern part of Utah shows a picture of Salt Lake City.

item.description: I-80 East Approaching UT-58 in Wendover. Path Over Freeway Is the Utah Port of

item.title: I-80 West Exit 2
item.description: I-80 West at Exit 2, UT-58 in Wendover

item.title: I-80 West Exit 41
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 41 - Knolls.

item.title: I-80 West Exit 41
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 41 - Knolls. The next exit westbound on I-80 is 37 miles.

item.title: I-80 West Exit 410 (Nevada Exit)
item.description: I-80 Before the Utah-Nevada Stateline at Exit 410. Exit 410 is a Nevada Interchange

item.title: I-80 West Exit 77
item.description: I-80 West at Exit 77, UT-198/Rowley/Dugway

item.title: I-80 West Exit 77
item.description: Iosepa Use Exit 77 Exit on I-80 West

item.title: I-80 at UT-138 (Exit 84)
item.description: UT-138 south at I-80 east (Exit 84) onramp.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 2
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 2 - UT-58/Wendover. This is the first exit along I-80 in Utah.

item.title: UT-138 North at I-80 Onramp (Exit 84)
item.description: UT-138 North at I-80 Onramp (Exit 84). Use I-80 east to Salt Lake; I-80 west to Wendover.
